title: Paragon NTFS v14.0.543 Mac OS X {B4tman}
description:
Paragon NTFS v14.0.543 Mac OS X {B4tman}
 
http://s13.postimg.org/8179eyxl3/26288.png

Description:-

Paragon NTFS breaks down the barriers between Windows and OS X. Paragon NTFS effectively solves the communication problems between the Mac system and NTFS, providing full read and write access to Windows NTFS partitions under OS X. Excellent solution for end users, SOHO, and enterprise, supports all NTFS versions from Windows NT 3.1 to Windows 8 (NTFS versions 1.2, 3.0, and 3.1), and mounts the NTFS volumes as native ones.

Features:-

â€¢ Unprecedented high NTFS performance. The transfer rate is the same as with the native HFS file system!
â€¢ Full read/write access to NTFS. OS X provides limited support of NTFS, the primary file system of any WindowsÂ® PC. With Paragonâ€™s NTFS for youâ€™ll get full read/write access to any version of NTFS under OS X
â€¢ Support for OS X 10.5 and 10.6 (32 and 64 bit), and OS X 10.7-10.11
â€¢ Easy to install. The driver is easily installed through a new user-friendly wizard
â€¢ Easy to use. Mount any NTFS partition like a native one â€“ no need to perform special commands to get access; just attach a disk or other media with NTFS partition and use it as you wish
â€¢ Create and repair NTFS partitions under the same way you usually do with HFS/HFS+
â€¢ Software update center. Get notifications about new updates and perform them by clicking only one button. Thatâ€™s all you need to do to keep your software updated
â€¢ Non-Roman characters and languages. File and folder names in national languages, including Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Russian
â€¢ No limitation to maximum file/partition size (within OS X and NTFS specifications)
â€¢ Native support for extended attributes

WHATâ€™S NEW in Version 14.0.543:-

â€¢ Increased transfer rates for read/write operations on SSDs
